name: Cool The Clock
description:
Made for Jame Gam #5 5th of November.

Heat or cool your clock to hasten or slow the flow of time and allow you to navigate tricky obstacles!

This is the first game jam I've participated in.

I'm happy with the main game mechanic I came up with and think it fits the theme well but art is terrible and sound is non-existent. I also didn't leave enough time to design and create obstacles.

All (awful) art made by me!

All feedback is very welcome, including criticism!
